series_description: This series consists of the fiscal Annual Report. Information from report becomes part of the Department's annual report.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after report date, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of the documents used to compile the Fiscal Annual Reports. Series may include feeder reports, status reports, computer printouts and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: Cut-off files at the end of the Fiscal Year. Retain in agency for 1 year, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of planning documents preserved to assist in preparation for future conferences and may include copies of RFPs, brochures, registrations, conference handouts, etc.
retention_statement: Cut-off files at the completion of Conference. Retain for 3 years, then destroy.

series_description: consists of documents used in the Administrative regulatory process. Series includes draft regulations, hearing notices, hearing records and other supporting documentation. Refer to
